moves.1. e4:
Hello i'd like to annotate this game because i found it fascinating...It was a game for the 5th round of 61st GK Tournament. I play with black here.
 So he started with e4.
moves.1... e5: I played e5. I always prefer that move instead of playing c5.
moves.2... Nc6: And typical reply too. I don't like Nf6.
moves.3. Bb5: He played with his white bishop. Nice move.
moves.3... Nf6: I replied by opening the knight and pushing e4 pawn. I like to open the king's side pieces.
moves.4. Nc3: In order to protect the e4 pawn.
moves.4... Bc5: I open the bishop. I wanted to castle and also open my white bishop with d6 pawn.
moves.5. O-O O-O: We castled, so far a quiet game. Noone is risking.
moves.6. Nxe5: So he attacked in the e pawn and i accepted that, nice move. He wanted to open the game and not being pathetic. i have the tendency as black to play a quiet game ( i prefer to play with white pawns).
moves.7. d4: I imagined that. Otherwise it would have been a bad move for him.
moves.7... Bxd4: I decided to sacrifice the bishop! Bye bye Bishop! I think i made the right choice.
moves.8. Qxd4: He took my bishop and he's queen has somehow a more attacking attitude.
moves.8... Qe7: I decided to open my queen too and protect my knight.
moves.9. Bg5: Now he's pushing the other knight but still i have no worries. Nice movement anyway.
moves.9... c6: I said now it's time to push his white bishop cause i did not like the square he controlled. But i had doubts for that movement..Nevermind!
moves.10. Bd3: He put it back. I still didn't have a serious plan in my mind.
moves.10... Nxd3: So i decided to take his bishop and sacrifice my knight.
moves.11... d6: d6 for opening the way for my white bishop. Another one would be fine i think..h6..But i did not make it so far.
moves.12. Qb4: I didn't actually understand this move cause i believe Bxf6 would be better. But ok he might have another plan in his mind.
moves.12... Qe5: I put my queen in a better square i think.
moves.13. f4: Nice! Now he shows me he likes to attack. But for me in a risky way. Who knows?
moves.13... Qe7: So i out my queen back!
moves.14. e5: e5?! Strange move for me. But nice! Haha.
moves.14... c5: Well i played c5 for pushing his queen cause i didn't want to respond in his e5 movement.
moves.15. exf6: Mmmmmmm strange again. At first i said oups whats that? What am i to do? But with a second thought i said ''great''! This is brilliant! He was attacking in an anorthodox way! See that..Qe3+!!
moves.15... Qe3+: Awesome!! My black queen must be so happy!
moves.16... cxb4: Sorry mate but that was great!
moves.18. Nd5 Qxd3: I took the pawn and control the game...No i have to move fast and checkmate.
moves.23. Bh4 Be6: Time for my bishop to move..
moves.26... Qxd3: Of course i took it.. He had no chances of winning.
moves.28. Bg1: The only think he can do.
moves.31... Qxg1#: And checkmate. I think that was nice. COmment and rate the game if you like! Thanks very much, Mario Dag!
